mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CODE (CODE_ID, CODE_NAME, CODE_LEVEL, UPPER_CODE, CODE_DC, REG_DATETIME, UPD_DATETIME, REG_ID, UPD_ID, NOTE, TEMP_COLUM) VALUES (#{code_id}, #{code_name}, #{code_level}, #{upper_code}, #{code_dc}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'), "", #{reg_id}, "", "", "")
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(A.CODE_ID, "") AS CODE_ID , IFNULL(A.CODE_NAME, "") AS CODE_NAME , IFNULL(A.CODE_LEVEL, "") AS CODE_LEVEL , IFNULL(A.UPPER_CODE, "") AS UPPER_CODE , IFNULL(A.CODE_DC, "") AS CODE_DC , IFNULL(A.REG_DATETIME, "") AS REG_DATETIME , IFNULL(A.UPD_DATETIME, "") AS UPD_DATETIME , IFNULL(A.REG_ID, "") AS REG_ID , IFNULL(A.UPD_ID, "") AS UPD_ID , IFNULL(A.NOTE, "") AS NOTE , IFNULL(A.TEMP_COLUM, "") AS TEMP_COLUM , IFNULL(B.CODE_NAME, "") AS UPPER_NAME FROM TB_CODE AS A LEFT JOIN TB_CODE AS B ON A.UPPER_CODE = B.CODE_ID ORDER BY A.CODE_LEVEL ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_CODE AS A
